protocol_milestones.v174.0.0: COMMANDER-STAFF-SAPPER: Orchestrator-driven state machine. Narrative Parser linked. Pruned redundant UI triggers. Stable media loop established. Hidden Door (Spacebar) override operational.

healing_report.methodology: Centralized all side effects into useLumiOrchestrator. Removed conflicting component states. Audio/Video generation is now gated by specific triggers and state locks, preventing resource exhaustion. UI layout remains persistent during asynchronous operations.
healing_report.state: Coherent. The dialogue box no longer disappears during thinking. Reality is stable.
